analysis.description:
Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.11 (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_size' of Grid.Grid (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#64) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_defaultPrice' of Grid.Grid (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#64-65) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_feeRatio' of Grid.Grid (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#65-66) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_incrementRate' of Grid.Grid (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#66-67) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_admin' of Grid.setAdmin (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#97-98) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_feeRatio' of Grid.setFeeRatio (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#101) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_defaultPrice' of Grid.setDefaultPrice (/unique_chucks/31/0x224a1fd635ec602316decb793370a45509543ce6.sol#105) is not in mixedCase
